types:type.name: order
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type order = {| orderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderDate: String, storeNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderDetails: {| orderChannel: String, orderType: String, total: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}, guestDetails: {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, frequency: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"orderNumber\\\":220011,\\\"orderDate\\\":\\\"03232022\\\",\\\"storeNumber\\\":11,\\\"orderDetails\\\":{\\\"orderChannel\\\":\\\"App\\\",\\\"orderType\\\":\\\"Mobile\\\",\\\"total\\\":25},\\\"guestDetails\\\":{\\\"id\\\":12466,\\\"name\\\":\\\"MM\\\",\\\"frequency\\\":\\\"New\\\"}}"}
